data.text: @LacusCurtius The notation accompanying ‘humanities’ probably refers to Literae Humaniores in UK or Humaniora in Belgium, narrowly referring to the study of (Greek and Latin) *Classics*, no other literatures and cultures. So yes, I’d say that that narrow definition of Humanities is obsolete.
@LacusCurtius Bloody well hope not! I still have things to say.
